channel.title: Meow on my Blog site
channel.description: Recent content in Meow on my Blog site

item.title: Meow
item.description: What does the acronym VM stand for? Virtual machine What tool do we use to interact with the operating system in order to issue commands via the command line, such as the one to start our VPN connection? It’s also known as a console or shell. Terminal What service do we use to form our VPN connection into HTB labs? Openvpn What tool do we use to test our connection to the target with an ICMP echo request?
